dict.string: Two years after Shelock's "death". Watson has moved on. But when Long is threatened by a terrorrist attack, Sherlock decides it's time to return.
While mortal danger stalks Watson's wedding reception, Sherlock faces his biggest challenge of all: delivering a best man's speech!
A case of stoeln letters leads Sherlock Holmes to engage in a long conflict with the powerful Chales Augustus Magnussen, the Napolean of blackmail.
In this special set in 1895, Holmes and Watson investigate a vengeful apparition in a wedding dress, reportedly the ghost of a suicide victim.
